prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon that resembles a rolling stone with glowing red accents.
I want a Pokemon that looks like a small, coal-like creature with bright orange spots.
Generate an image of a Pokemon that has a black rocky body and a shiny orange core.
Make a rock Pokemon that is round, with a rugged texture and surrounded by smaller stones.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies the essence of coal, with a vibrant orange glow at its center.
Design a tiny Pokemon with a body shaped like a rolling boulder and fiery orange highlights.
Show me a Pokemon with a dark rock exterior and glowing elements, perfect for a cave habitat.
